misc.databases_allow_random: Enable database deployment on random nodes

form.validation_error: There is the following error: | There are the following errors:

validator.accepted: The value must be accepted | The {attribute} field must be accepted
validator.active_url: The value is not a valid URL | The {attribute} field is not a valid URL
validator.after: The value must be a date after {date} | The {attribute} field must be a date after {date}
validator.after_or_equal: The value must be a date after or equal to {date} | The {attribute} field must be a date after or equal to {date}
validator.alpha: The value may only contain letters | The {attribute} field may only contain letters
validator.alpha_dash: The value may only contain letters, numbers, and dashes | The {attribute} field may only contain letters, numbers, and dashes
validator.alpha_num: The value may only contain letters and numbers | The {attribute} field may only contain letters and numbers
validator.array: The value must be an array | The {attribute} field must be an array
validator.before: The value must be a date before {date} | The {attribute} field must be a date before {date}
validator.before_or_equal: The value must be a date before or equal to {date} | The {attribute} field must be a date before or equal to {date}

between.numeric: The value must be between {min} and {max} | The {attribute} field must be between {min} and {max}
between.file: The value must be between {min} and {max} kilobytes | The {attribute} field must be between {min} and {max} kilobytes
between.string: The value must be between {min} and {max} characters | The {attribute} field must be between {min} and {max} characters
between.array: The value must be between {min} and {max} items | The {attribute} field must be between {min} and {max} items

validator.boolean: The value must be true or false | The {attribute} field must be true or false
validator.confirmed: The value confirmation does not match | The {attribute} field confirmation does not match
validator.date: The value is not a valid date | The {attribute} field is not a valid date
validator.date_format: The value does not match the format {format} | The {attribute} field does not match the format {format}
validator.different: The value and {other} must be different | The {attribute} field and {other} must be different
validator.digits: The value must be {digits} digits | The {attribute} field must be {digits} digits
validator.digits_between: The value must be between {min} and {max} digits | The {attribute} field must be between {min} and {max} digits
validator.dimensions: The value has invalid image dimensions | The {attribute} field has invalid image dimensions
validator.distinct: The value has a duplicate value | The {attribute} field has a duplicate value
validator.email: The value must be a valid email address | The {attribute} field must be a valid email address
validator.exists: The value is invalid | The {attribute} field is invalid
validator.file: The value must be a file | The {attribute} field must be a file
validator.filled: The value is required | The {attribute} field is required
validator.image: The value must be an image | The {attribute} field must be an image
validator.in: The value is invalid | The {attribute} field is invalid
validator.in_array: The value does not exist in {other} | The {attribute} field does not exist in {other}
validator.integer: The value must be a valid integer | The {attribute} field must be an integer.
validator.ip: The value must be a valid IP address | The {attribute} field must be a valid IP address
validator.json: The value must be a valid JSON string | The {attribute} field must be a valid JSON string

max.numeric: The value may not be greater than {max} | The {attribute} field may not be greater than {max}
max.file: The value may not be greater than {max} kilobytes | The {attribute} field may not be greater than {max} kilobytes
max.string: The value may not be greater than {max} characters | The {attribute} field may not be greater than {max} characters
max.array: The value may not be greater than {max} items | The {attribute} field may not be greater than {max} items

validator.mimes: The value must be a file of type: {values} | The {attribute} field must be a file of type: {values}
validator.mimetypes: The value must be a file of type: {values} | The {attribute} field must be a file of type: {values}

min.numeric: The value must be at least {min} | The {attribute} field must be at least {min}
min.file: The value must be at least {min} kilobytes | The {attribute} field must be at least {min} kilobytes
min.string: The value must be at least {min} characters | The {attribute} field must be at least {min} characters
min.array: The value must be at least {min} items | The {attribute} field must be at least {min} items

validator.not_in: The value is invalid | The {attribute} field is invalid
validator.numeric: The value must be a number | The {attribute} field must be a number
validator.present: The value must be present | The {attribute} field must be present
validator.regex: The value is invalid | The {attribute} field is invalid
validator.required: The field is required | The {attribute} field is required
validator.required_if: The value is required when {other} is {value} | The {attribute} field is required when {other} is {value}
validator.required_unless: The value is required unless {other} is in {values} | The {attribute} field is required unless {other} is in {values}
validator.required_with: The value is required when {values} is present | The {attribute} field is required when {values} is present
validator.required_with_all: The value is required when {values} is present | The {attribute} field is required when {values} is present
validator.required_without: The value is required when {values} is not present | The {attribute} field is required when {values} is not present
validator.required_without_all: The value is required when none of {values} are present | The {attribute} field is required when none of {values} are present
validator.same: The value and {other} must match | The {attribute} field and {other} must match

validator.string: The value must be a string | The {attribute} field must be a string
validator.timezone: The value must be a valid zone | The {attribute} field must be a valid zone
